title: Health
description:
Defines a recurring health check request for its backend. Results can be obtained via the backends.<label>.health variables.
Changes in health states and related requests will be logged. Default User-Agent will be Couper / <version> health-check if not provided
via headers attribute. An unhealthy backend will return with a backend_unhealthy error.

title: JWT Signing Profile
description:
The jwt_signing_profile block lets you configure a JSON Web Token signing
profile for your gateway. It is referenced in the jwt_sign() function
by its required label.
